snippet: The president and chief executive of the Feinstein Institute for Medical Research of the North Shore-LIJ Health System says innovation depends on learning how something works.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office features interview with Dr Kevin J Tracey, president and chief executive of the Feinstein Institute for Medical Research of the North Shore-LIJ Health System, discussing his management technique.
lead_paragraph: The president and chief executive of the Feinstein Institute for Medical Research of the North Shore-LIJ Health System says innovation depends on learning how something works.
